text: Nothing in Common is a 1986 American romantic comedy drama movie directed by Garry Marshall and starring Tom Hanks, Jackie Gleason, Eva Marie Saint, Hector Elizondo, Barry Corbin, Sela Ward, Bess Armstrong. It was spun off into a short lived TV series in 1987. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1986 comedy- drama movies Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:1986 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies directed by Garry Marshall Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: Nothing in Common
